Package com.alvermont.terraj.stargen

Contains all the code for the Stargen and Dole accretion libraries.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Planet An interface to be implemented by objects that hold details of planets.
PlanetFilter Interface for planet filters
Primary Interface that describes a star
StarFilter Interface for star filters
 

Class Summary
Accrete Planetary accretions
AccreteTest Simple test that generates a system.
AccreteUtils Some computations factored out of the Accrete class to reduce its size
BasicPlanet Class representing a planet
BasicPrimary Class that details a star
ChemTable Holds details of chemical elements
Constants Various constant values needed by the calculations
Display Display related functions.
DustRecord Bean class that details one dust band
Enviro Planetary environment related calculations and similar functions.
EnviroUtils Computations factored out of the Enviro class
Gas Bean class describing a gas
Gases The GASES table
Generator Handles the top level planetary system generation
GenStar Random star generation with realistic, mass, luminosity and spectral class.
Star Class representing a star
StargenParameters Holds the parameters for solar system generation in a bean
 

Enum Summary
Breathability Enum for breathability types
PlanetType Enumeration for planetary types.
 

Exception Summary
StargenException Base exception class for stargen
 

Package com.alvermont.terraj.stargen Description

Contains all the code for the Stargen and Dole accretion libraries. These can be used to generate stars and solar systems based on scientific theories of how they are formed.

Related Documentation

For overviews, tutorials, examples, guides, and tool documentation, please see:
  • Habitable Planets for Man by Stephen Dole. This paper contains quite a bit of the theory behind the equations in this package.
